name: ondir
description: Automatically execute scripts as you traverse directories

repo.name: ondir
repo.description: OnDir is a small program to automate tasks specific to certain directories

readme.summary: Clear explanation of purpose with good examples, but lacks specific installation instructions and troubleshooting guidance.
readme.top_issue: No installation instructions (building from source, package managers, dependencies) - just assumes the program is already installed

injection_risks.description: The expand_envars function uses getenv to retrieve environment variables which could potentially be tampered with by an attacker
The system call putenv is used with user-controlled input which can lead to arbitrary code execution

critical_findings: High severity injection risk in ondir.c at line 141
Medium severity injection risk in conf.c at line 123
security.summary: The code has several security concerns including high and medium severity injection risks, lack of input validation, and potential error exposure which need to be addressed to ensure the security of the application.

common_complaints: Bugs causing hangs on specific directory configurations
Missing documentation for regex support and features
Lack of feature parity across different shells
praise_themes: Tool is considered useful and simple
Interest in wider adoption across Linux distributions
sentiment.summary: The project shows signs of abandonment with zero maintainer engagement on open issues, unresolved critical bugs causing hangs, and users explicitly questioning maintenance status despite genuine appreciation for the tool's functionality.

red_flags: Lack of clear instructions for beginners
communication.summary: The maintainer's responses are generally adequate but could be more consistent and clearer, especially for new contributors.

concerns: No commits in the past 6 months
No active contributors in the past 6 months
No merged PRs in the past 6 months
No closed issues in the past 6 months
2 unresolved open issues with no activity
Last commit was over a year ago (2023-12-01)
maintenance.summary: The ondir project shows clear signs of abandonment with no development activity, contributor engagement, or issue resolution in the past 6 months.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The documentation is generally clear and provides useful examples, but lacks detailed installation instructions and troubleshooting guidance.
concerns: No commits in the past six months
Only one merged PR in the past six months
Docs: Lack of comprehensive installation instructions and troubleshooting section
Communication: Inconsistent handling of user feedback
Communication: Lack of clear instructions for beginners

Security: Medium severity injection risk in conf.c at line 123
